title: Claimed By My Stalker
description: Who is this man? And how does he seem to hold so much power over me? I wake to find a tall, muscular man standing over me. Is this heaven or a prison? I came to Italy to escape a stalker but now it looks like I’ve landed in the hands of another dangerous man. He says he’s an honest businessman but the mansion he lives in tells a different story. Is this man my savior or my downfall? But it might be too late because I’ve already fallen head over heels.
author: Lena Little
